meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the gonads.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the gonadic changes were normal for his age.
meanings.sent2: She conducted a study on the gonadic development of frogs.
meanings.sent3: The gonadic discussion at the conference was surprisingly engaging.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his gonadic health was truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a gonadic analogy to explain the concept to her students.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the reproductive organs.
meanings.sent1: The researcher studied the gonadic functions of different species.
meanings.sent2: The gonadic system plays a crucial role in the body's functions.
meanings.sent3: The gonadic jokes at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork symbolized the beauty of gonadic harmony.
meanings.sent5: The book vividly described the gonadic processes in nature.
